chip: You could show Claude the file directly
description: Shares files directly with Claude rather than describing or copy-pasting their contents. Surface when user describes or summarizes a document, asks about content they have in a file, is transcribing or pasting content, or references a document, PDF, or data file. Satisfied when user uploads or attaches a file using phrases like: here's the file, I've attached, see attached, uploading, let me share the document, I'll upload.
detail: Instead of describing what's in a document or copy-pasting excerpts, you can give Claude the file directly. It can read PDFs, documents, spreadsheets, and code filesâ€”then analyze, summarize, or work with the full content. Let Claude see what you're seeing.
